name: Optic Blast
flavor: Your eyes emit rays of powerful enervating force.

metadata.flavor: Your eyes emit rays of powerful enervating force.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: When targeting an object with a solid reflective surface or a creature carrying or wearing such an object (such as a mirror, an unpainted metal shield, or shiny metal plate armor), you can target one additional creature or object within 3 squares of the first target.

effects.name: Strained
effects.effect: You gain 1 surge that you can use immediately, and you take damage equal to your Reason score that can't be reduced in any way.
